#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#define inp1(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define inp2(a,b) scanf("%d%d",&a,&b)
#define clear memset(a,0,sizeof a)
#define rep(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define repl(i,a,n) for(i=a;i<=n;i++)
#define out(a) printf("%d\n",a)
int h1[100005],h2[100005];
int main()
{
    int t,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    int a1;
    int a2;
    
    rep(i,t)
    {
        inp2(a1,a2);
        h1[a1]++;
        
        if(a1!=a2)
            h2[a2]++;
    }
    //printf("%d %d %d\n",h1[5],h2[5],r[5]);
    int min=999999999,m,eo,f=0;
    eo=t/2;
    if(t&1)
    eo++;
    rep(i,100005)
    {
if(h1[i]>=eo)
{ f=1;
min=0; break;}
        if(h1[i]+h2[i]>=eo)
        {
        	f=1;
            m=eo-h1[i];
            
            if(m<min)
            {
            	
          //  printf("%d\n",i);
                min=m;
            }
        }

    }
    if(f==1)
    out(min);
    else
    printf("Impossible\n");
    return 0;
}
